content:
Hi everyone!

I'm trying to configure rust-analyzer language server (with neovim) and have one small issue. Is there a possibility to set the target-dir for rust-analyzer? Or make it to read the path from .cargo/config?
I couldn't find anything in the documentation :( Also documentation of rls is very unclear. At some point there was rls.toml file, but it was removed.
Ech.. nvm, for some reason it started to work.. But have no clue what was wrong. It looks that it properly reads the cargo config.
